movies.title: Black Widow
movies.description: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her past when a dangerous conspiracy arises.

movies.title: No Time to Die
movies.description: James Bond comes out of retirement to rescue a kidnapped scientist, leading him onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: Paul Atreides leads nomadic tribes in a battle to control the desert planet Arrakis and its valuable resource.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Peter Parker's world turns upside down when familiar villains from alternate dimensions threaten to destroy reality.

movies.title: A Quiet Place Part II
movies.description: The Abbott family continues to face terrors from the outside world as they navigate the silent survival in their post-apocalyptic reality.

movies.title: Fast & Furious 9
movies.description: Dominic Toretto and his crew face their most skilled enemy yet, his forsaken brother, Jakob.

movies.title: Cruella
movies.description: Estella, a young fashion-obsessed orphan, becomes the iconic villain Cruella de Vil in 1970s London.

movies.title: Jungle Cruise
movies.description: A riverboat captain and a scientist embark on an adventure to find a magical tree in the heart of the Amazon rainforest.

movies.title: The Suicide Squad
movies.description: A team of supervillains is sent on a dangerous mission to a South American island filled with enemies.

movies.title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
movies.description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren uncover a chilling story of terror, murder, and unknown evil.

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.description: Shang-Chi, a skilled martial artist, is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

movies.title: The Matrix Resurrections
movies.description: Neo awakens in a world where humans are unaware of the Matrix and must embark on a journey to reclaim his identity.

movies.title: Free Guy
movies.description: A bank teller discovers he is a background character in an open-world video game and decides to become the hero of his own story.

movies.title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
movies.description: A single mom and her two kids uncover the legacy of the Ghostbusters and the secrets left behind by their grandfather.

movies.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
movies.description: Eddie Brock struggles to coexist with the shape-shifting alien symbiote as they face a new threat, the psychotic Carnage.

movies.title: Luca
movies.description: Two young sea monsters experience a life-changing summer on the Italian Riviera.

movies.title: Candyman
movies.description: A visual artist uncovers the true story behind the myth of Candyman, a ghostly killer with a hook for a hand.

movies.title: Cry Macho
movies.description: A one-time rodeo star takes a job to bring back his employer's young son, crossing paths with dangerous characters along the way.

movies.title: Judas and the Black Messiah
movies.description: The story of Fred Hampton, a young charismatic activist, and his betrayal by an FBI informant.

movies.title: The French Dispatch
movies.description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional 20th-century French city.

movies.title: Old
movies.description: A family on a tropical vacation discovers that the secluded beach they are visiting causes them to age rapidly.

movies.title: The Green Knight
movies.description: A medieval fantasy adventure based on the Arthurian legend of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight.

movies.title: Nomadland
movies.description: A woman in her sixties embarks on a journey through the American West, living as a modern-day nomad.

movies.title: Minari
movies.description: A Korean-American family moves to Arkansas in search of their own American Dream.

movies.title: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
movies.description: A quirky family embarks on a road trip to save humanity from a robot uprising.

movies.title: Cruel Summer
movies.description: The chilling story of a popular teen girl who goes missing and the aftermath that follows.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
movies.description: The epic clash between two titans, Godzilla and Kong, as the world watches to see who will become the king of monsters.

movies.title: Mortal Kombat
movies.description: A washed-up mixed martial arts fighter becomes Earth's champion in a high-stakes tournament against otherworldly adversaries.

movies.title: Raya and the Last Dragon
movies.description: A young warrior embarks on a quest to find the last dragon and save her kingdom from an ancient evil.

movies.title: The Father
movies.description: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages, grappling with his changing circumstances and his own mind.

movies.title: Soul
movies.description: A musician who has lost his passion for music is transported out of his body and must find his way back with the help of an infant soul.

genres.title: Action
genres.description: Movies that involve exciting and fast-paced sequences, often featuring physical stunts, combat, and adventurous storylines.

genres.title: Science Fiction
genres.description: Movies that explore imaginative and futuristic concepts, often involving advanced technology, space exploration, and speculative ideas.

genres.title: Horror
genres.description: Movies that aim to elicit fear, suspense, and shock, often featuring supernatural elements, monsters, or psychological thrills.

genres.title: Comedy
genres.description: Movies intended to amuse and entertain through humor, wit, and comedic situations, often delivering light-hearted and funny narratives.

genres.title: Adventure
genres.description: Movies that involve thrilling journeys, exploration of new territories, and exciting quests, often featuring heroic protagonists.

genres.title: Animation
genres.description: Movies created using animation techniques, involving the use of artwork or computer-generated imagery to tell stories and bring characters to life.

genres.title: Drama
genres.description: Movies that focus on realistic and emotional storytelling, often delving into complex characters, relationships, and human experiences.

genres.title: Biography
genres.description: Movies that depict the life stories of real people, often exploring their achievements, struggles, and significant events from their lives.

genres.title: Thriller
genres.description: Movies that generate suspense, tension, and excitement, often involving intense and unpredictable plots with thrilling twists and turns.

genres.title: Fantasy
genres.description: Movies that feature elements of magic, mythical creatures, and supernatural phenomena, often set in imaginative and fantastical worlds.
